steps.name: Given I am on the HOME page
When I clock in the timesheet with PIN "4040"
Click locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#alert-dialog-title').filter({ hasText: 'PASSWORD' }) }).getByText('4', { exact: true })
Click locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#alert-dialog-title').filter({ hasText: 'PASSWORD' }) }).getByText('0', { exact: true })
Click locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#alert-dialog-title').filter({ hasText: 'PASSWORD' }) }).getByText('4', { exact: true })
Click locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#alert-dialog-title').filter({ hasText: 'PASSWORD' }) }).getByText('0', { exact: true })
Click locator('div[role="dialog"]').filter({ has: locator('#alert-dialog-title') }).locator('div.MuiDialogActions-root').getByRole('button', { name: 'CONFIRM', exact: true })
Then I should see the employee "Aubrey" in the employee list
Then I should see the "Ticket View" screen
And I should see the "Manicure" service
When I add the "Manicure" service to my cart
Then I should see my cart showing 1 item added
When I select the service "Manicure" in my cart
Expect "toBeVisible" locator('ul.xTicketFunctions__menu li').getByText('CHANGE PRICE', { exact: true }).first()
Click locator('ul.xTicketFunctions__menu li').getByText('CHANGE PRICE', { exact: true }).first()
When I click on the "Pay" button
And I select the "Gift" payment type
Then I should see the gift card balance "$20.00" visible
